description: CPU usage spiked to 95.5% due to a runaway background process consuming excessive resources. The issue was resolved by identifying and terminating the rogue process.
resolution: Terminated background process ID 1234, implemented resource limits

description: Memory usage reached 92.3% causing system slowdown. Investigation revealed a memory leak in the application cache that was not being cleared properly.
resolution: Restarted application, fixed cache clearing logic, added monitoring

description: High CPU usage at 88.7% detected during backup process. This is expected behavior during scheduled backups but triggered the threshold alert.
resolution: Adjusted alert threshold for backup windows, no action needed

description: Memory usage increased to 85.2% due to large dataset being loaded into memory for processing. System recovered after processing completed.
resolution: Optimized data loading to use chunking, added swap space

description: Moderate CPU spike to 78.5% caused by multiple concurrent user requests during peak hours. System remained responsive but nearing capacity.
resolution: Scaled up worker processes, implemented request queuing

description: Memory usage at 75.8% due to accumulated log files and temporary data. Regular cleanup process had failed to run.
resolution: Manually cleared old logs, fixed cron job for automatic cleanup

description: CPU usage spiked to 91.2% due to antivirus scan running during business hours. Scan was scheduled improperly.
resolution: Rescheduled antivirus scans to off-peak hours

description: Memory usage reached 88.9% when database query returned unexpectedly large result set. Query needed optimization.
resolution: Added pagination to query, optimized indexes, added result size limits
